Page 1144
From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @steptoe.com
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Subject: RE: EPSTEIN, Jeffrey, reg. no. 76318-054
Sent: Tue, 30 Jul 2019 17:09:14 +0000
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C) - Perfect. I'll ring you then.
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Sent: Tuesday, July 30, 2019 12:59 PM
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @steptoe.com>
Subject: RE: EPSTEIN, Jeffrey, reg. no. 76318-054
Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C),
I was out & about in the institution. I can chat at 2.
Thank you,
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @steptoe.com> 7/30/2019 9:51 AM >>>
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Are you still good for a 2 pm call today to continue our discussions from yesterday? (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Partner
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @steptoe.com
direct | +1 917 349 (b)(6);
(b)(7)(C) | +1 212 506 3950 fax
Steptoe
Steptoe & Johnson LLP
1114 Avenue of the Americas | New York, NY 10036
www.steptoe.com

From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Sent: Tuesday, July 30, 2019 7:59 AM
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @steptoe.com>
Subject: EPSTEIN, Jeffrey, reg. no. 76318-054
Good morning (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
I wanted to let you know that there may be a brief delay in getting your client to attorney-conference this morning as he is getting a shower, haircut, medical assessment, etc.
Thank you,
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
DOJ-OGR-00025366
